thread.title: Marin County trials for 3 drifters held in S.F., Fairfax killings
thread.title_full: Marin County trials for 3 drifters held in S.F., Fairfax killings - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Kale Williams
title: Marin County trials for 3 drifters held in S.F., Fairfax killings
text:
From left to right: Sean Michael Angold, Lila Scott Alligood, Morrison Haze Lampley. From left to right: Sean Michael Angold, Lila Scott Alligood,...
The three drifters accused of killing a backpacker in San Francisco’s Golden Gate Park before gunning down a dog-walking hiker on a scenic trail near Fairfax three days later will stand trial for both slayings in Marin County, authorities said Monday. From left to right: Sean Michael Angold, Lila Scott Alligood, Morrison Haze Lampley. From left to right: Sean Michael Angold, Lila Scott Alligood,...
The three drifters accused of killing a backpacker in San Francisco’s Golden Gate Park before gunning down a dog-walking hiker on a scenic trail near Fairfax three days later will stand trial for both slayings in Marin County, authorities said Monday.
